body_html:
No, just like @shashishekhar said, you need to add one line in tensorflow/.tf_configure.bazelrc:
build --action_env ANDROID_NDK_API_LEVEL=21
if that doesn't work, you need to change your workspace file which in tensorflow/WORKSPACE, and modify your ndk repository settings with:

android_ndk_repository(
name = "androidndk",
path = "/Users/kyoushouu/Library/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle",
api_level = 21,
)

and rebuild tensorflow lite will be best solution for this issue.

body:
No, just like @shashishekhar said, you need to add one line in tensorflow/.tf_configure.bazelrc:
build --action_env ANDROID_NDK_API_LEVEL=21
if that doesn't work, you need to change your workspace file which in tensorflow/WORKSPACE, and modify your ndk repository settings with:

android_ndk_repository(
    name = "androidndk",
    path = "/Users/kyoushouu/Library/Android/sdk/ndk-bundle",
    api_level = 21,
)

and rebuild tensorflow lite will be best solution for this issue.
